import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import data from "../datas.json"; const Header = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(""); const history = useHistory(); const handleSearchChange = (event) => { setSearchTerm(event.target.value); }; const handleSearchSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if (searchTerm.trim() !== "") { history.push(`/search?query=${searchTerm}`); setSearchTerm(""); // Clear search term after submission } }; return (
